It tells the story of Jason Bourne, who wakes up in a hospital with no memory of his past or how he got to the hospital. He soon discovers that he has been trained to be a skilled assassin and that there are people who want him dead. With the help of his training partner, Alex Connelly, and his former mentor, Robert Novak, Jason Bourne must navigate treacherous political landscapes, deadly assassins, and powerful rivalries while trying to piece together his past and how he got to the hospital.
- In the Valley of Elah: This movie is based on the novel "In the Valley of Elah" by David Samuels. It tells the story of Rachel Weisz, a young woman who has just returned from a tour of duty in Iraq. She soon discovers that she has been trained to be a skilled assassin and that there are people who want her dead.
